name: ShinePhone
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, set bedroom light to 50 percent”
”Alexa, dim bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the ShinePhone skill for Alexa, you can now interact with your ShinePhone devices by voice. To get started, select the "Enable" button in the Alexa app to link your ShinePhone account and discover your devices.

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:
Use the names you previously defined. They are displayed in the ShinePhone app and can be edited.
Create an Alexa group, such as Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group.
Once you know the name or group name of your devices, you can say the following:
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom."
"Alexa,set bedroom light to 50 percent."
If you have any questions, please email growatt2016@163.com to contact us.
